so I was just wondering if there is a mod or a way to unlock the ksp window ( so that the window options unlock full screen( not just minimize maximize and close) its just realy annoying that I need to press my windows key to get out, wait 3 seconds, find what I need, then press the window, and wait 5 seconds for the game to start up. I am not just talking about resizing the window (beacuse i have a mod to do it, but its not what Im trying to do. an example of what I want is, in the minecraft launcher, you can lock or unlock the window (which allows you to see the windows border and the taskbar) and a locked mode, witch is what ksp has ( it makes it so that the window is can not be resized, other than fullscreening it)

my question may be confusing, but I have no other way to ask it.

The only stock way you can do it (afaik) is to de-select full screen in graphics options and run KSP as a maximised window.  This will effectively be full screen (apart from a small window line at the very top of your screen) but also you can move the mouse down to the start bar no problems at all - I just tried it and it works fine.

You can Alt-Tab from full screen mode also so try that, but I'm not sure if that will be any better for you.  I have an insanely fast computer so either way I do it it's totally instantaneous.

There's also some information in this thread which may help you creating a border-less windowed full screen version of KSP so you can browse "without switching".

Also worth googling a google on it as there's some other threads out there discussing the same issues for single and multi monitor borderless windowed KSP.

 

Not sure if there is a specific mod for this.

Hope that helps

SM
